datasheets.name: Lord Kaphrael

other.name: Euphoric Strikes
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1.

datasheets.fluff: Lord Kaphrael has led the Callous Blades to victories uncounted. Possessed of towering arrogance justified by his martial prowess, the Lord Exultant singles out the enemy’s champions for death, inspiring his warriors by inflicting a gory demise upon his chosen foes.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: INFRACTORS
datasheets.loadout: ■ This model is equipped with: Phoenix power spear; power fist.

datasheets.name: Infractors

special.description: At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, before any units have been set up, this unit can be split into two units, each containing five models.
special.name: Patrol Squads

datasheets.fluff: Consumed by an obsessive desire to experience sensation in all its forms, Infractors hurl themselves upon the foe with ecstatic glee. Their veins thick with an esoteric cocktail of combat stimms, they are formidable and relentlessly cruel combatants.
datasheets.loadout:
■ The Obsessionist is equipped with: bolt pistol; power sword.
■ Every Infractor is equipped with: bolt pistol; duelling sabre.

datasheets.name: Flawless Blades

other.name: Daemonic Patrons
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, it can call upon daemonic patrons. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, an unmodified Wound roll of 3+ scores a Critical Wound. At the end of the Fight phase, if this unit called upon daemonic patrons this phase and no enemy models were destroyed by attacks made by models in this unit this phase, one model in this unit is destroyed.

datasheets.fluff: These cruel and arrogant warriors are consumed by pride in their own skill at arms. Granted power by daemonic patrons, the Flawless Blades strive to entertain their malefic masters with superlative swordplay and by inflicting vile and visceral death upon their foes.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; blissblade.

stratagems.name: Duellist’s Death
stratagems.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the FLAWLESS BLADES keyword. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.fluff: The Emperor’s Children are perfectionists to the last. Even in death they seek to satisfy their violent obsessions.

stratagems.name: Shatter Strike
stratagems.target: One FLAWLESS BLADES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.
stratagems.fluff: Allying power to grace, the Flawless Blades cut down their foes in a few brutally efficient strikes.

stratagems.name: Obsessive Focus
stratagems.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of models in your unit (excluding the Objective Control characteristic) and any weapons they are equipped with, and you can ignore any or all modifiers to the characteristics of attacks made by models in your unit.
stratagems.fluff: The Emperor’s Children are precise and ruthless in their methods of war. Nothing can sway them from their murderous path.

enhancements.name: Distorting Vapours
enhancements.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Stealth ability and that unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

enhancements.name: Transhuman Speed
enhancements.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit and, in your Movement phase, each time a model in that unit makes a move, it can move through enemy models (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of such models but cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them, and any Desperate Escape test is automatically passed.
